actionTemplate.title: Western Eye (Crease-Defined / Cut-Crease Style)
steps: Apply a light base and keep the brow bone area clean
Sketch a crease line above the socket and blend into shadow
Pop shimmer or a light shade on the center lid for dimension
Deepen and elongate the outer corner; tightline the lashes

rationaleTemplate: Maximizes depth by pushing contrast between crease shadow and lid highlight.
Best for parties, stage looks, or strong-structure makeup.
